title: Excellent electric standing desk
body: For the price, you can’t beat this electric standing desk. The fit was very good, and assembly was easy. I only wish it were four inches wider. Kudos to the manufacturer for including extra screws, just in case.

title: nice
body: It works well and is easy to assemble.

title: Absolutely love it!
body: This desk is great! It’s very sturdy and easy to put together. It looks and fits perfect in my space. The height adjustment works surprisingly very well.

title: Bad
body: Holes don’t match

title: Perfect desk!!
body: This desk is amazing. I work exclusively remote and finally traded in my old clunky ugly desk with a manual desk topper thing to stand up/down for this desk. I looked at so many desks but this one is small and I didn’t want a huge desk taking over the room. I got the desk, keyboard under mount and the monitor holder (all separate) but they work together amazingly!! My husband had no issues with assembling the various parts. I didn’t even know the motor thing has a timer included, where you can set the timer for .5 to 4 hours and it will give you the much needed reminder to stand up or sit down! I am guilty of sitting for hours otherwise. Having the under mount keyboard has completely fixed my terrible hunched shoulder position that was really messing with my traps and shoulders while working. I should have bought this desk and whole setup years ago. I just hope the motor lasts for several years

title: Buyer beware
body: Arrived damages with large scratch in wood.

title: SO GOOD
body: I love it! Great quality for the price and I recommend it so much.

title: Lack of Sturdiness
body:
I have just completed assembling it and am a little bit disappointed with its sturdiness. The main table-top is made of two pieces of wood connected by small wooden dowels provided in the package. After connecting the two, I still notice a slight gap on the left side between the two which is annoying if you notice it. The wood on the back where the monitors are supposed to sit seem strong, but the front part seems very flimsy. I feel if I push my self up from it enough times, the dowels will eventually snap. I don't feel comfortable putting my head down or putting too much pressure on it which really does not put me in a peace of mind.

Also noticed some small smudges that are a bit noticeable because I got a lighter color

title: Good desk, good price
body: I've had this desk for over a year now and its held up and done well.

title: Quality and Customer Support
body:
I have had this desk for around a year with no issues at all. Easy to assemble and sturdy enough for daily use.

I recently moved and lost my power cord. Even though it was outside of my warranty period, Claiks still helped me out with a replacement.

Seems like a good product and manufacturer. Would recommend!
